properties.title: Zambezi River
properties.description: rickinzim posted a photo: The children playing on a sand bank in the middle of the Zambezi river. There would be some serious Health & Safety issues here in any 1st world Country. Fast flowing water, crocodiles and hippos to mention a few..... A Zimbabwean way of life we are blessed to have !

properties.title: Sunrise on the Zambezi
properties.description: shahar.bar posted a photo: Sunrise on the Zambezi, this picture taken in Victoria Falls town in Zimbabwe. This was an amazing day, I woke up at 5 in the morning in Zimbabwe and was picked up by a local photographer that took me to see the sunrise with the baboons, he knew exactly where is the baboons because he got into their pack when he every morning woke up to take picture with them. We got to the place before the sunrise and the baboons just woke up, in the mean time when I waited for a better light and for the baboons to wake up I saw the sunrise and I took this picture. Later I took really good pictures of the baboons and it was amazing because they were every where around climbing, jumping, checking who is the strange people and after 40 minutes they just left us.

properties.title: Baby River Turtle
properties.description: philip158 posted a photo: This little fellow was still really small about 5-7cm in length, must have been vary dangerous for him in the big Zambezi River where I took this photograph. The photo doesn't show but i thought this was a cool find.
